rampdata 0.1.0
  • Reference

Reference

All functions

add_path()

Modify parts of the ramp path by name.

as.lfn()

Return a path as a logical filename, which is a relative path.

as.path()

Convert a ramp path into a simple string filename for reading or writing.

cached_config()

Get the configuration file and store as package global.

clear.provenance()

Clear provenance data for a new run.

cluster_logging()

Set up logging for running on the cluster.

data_configuration()

Reads configuration file on where to download data.

.baseLogger

This is the namespace in which all logging messages are placed, so that they can be controlled as a group.

.errorLogger

Create a child namespace that also logs errors to a file.

.get.shp.metadata()

Return extra metadata associated with .shp file

.rampdata.config

This variable contains configuration for the file locations.

.replace.methods.with.spy()

Replace methods in global namespace with the spying methods defined below

download_bioko_grids()

Retrieve Bioko grid data.

download_worldpop()

Retrieve worldpop data.

ensure_on_server()

Ensure a set of local files are on the server.

ensure_present()

Ensure files are available locally.

get.input.files()

Get the list of files that were recorded as inputs.

get.metadata()

Returns metadata for a file

get.output.files()

Get the list of files that were recorded as outputs

get_from_ihme()

Use scp to retrieve data.

initialize_workflow()

Read a workflow file in order to set up versions of inputs.

inverse_ramp_path1()

Turns a relative path into a ramp path.

logtrace() logdebug() loginfo() logwarn() logerror() logfatal()

Functions to emit logging messages.

local_logging()

Set up logging for use on a local machine.

local_path()

The fully-rooted local path to a file.

log_module()

Set the logging level on some part of a package.

project_path()

Creates a path relative to the project root

prov.input.file()

Record that this code used this input file.

prov.output.file()

Record that this code used this output file.

ramp_path()

Make a RAMP path.

ramp_path1()

Formats a base path for a file given all keys.

ramp_path_from_rooted()

Convert a single string into a ramp path.

rampdata

rampdata: put and get data for RAMP calculations

read_workflow_config()

Read a workflow description file.

save_source()

Save information about a directory or data file.

send_to_ihme()

Use scp to send data.

un7zip()

Unzip a 7zip file.

workflow_path()

Get a ramp_path from a workflow configuration file.

write.meta.data()

Write the list of input files to a file on disk.
